column1: Long-Term Trend Reading, Age 9, National School Lunch Program eligibility, 3 categories

Average scale scores for age 9 long-term trend reading, by National School Lunch Program eligibility, 3 categories [SLUNCH3] and jurisdiction: 2022, 2020, 2012, 2008, 2004, 1999, 1996, 1994, 1992, 1990, 1988, 1984, 1980, 1975, and 1971
